rows.label: qst502016_msg0001
rows.name: How can I help?

rows.label: qst502016_msg0002
rows.name: Oh! A Blade who looks very strong...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0003
rows.name: P-please don't stare...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0004
rows.name: My apologies.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0005
rows.name:
I'd like to borrow
your lightning power.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0006
rows.name:
If it's lightning power, I
might not be much help. I
can't control it very well...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0007
rows.name: That's perfectly fine.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm creating lightning-resistant
equipment, and I'd like to test it.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0009
rows.name:
I want you to hit it with all
your might so I can test the
equipment's durability.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0010
rows.name: If that's all... I'll give it a try!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0011
rows.name: Wait, I'm doing it to you, Miloth-san!?

rows.label: qst502016_msg0012
rows.name: Yes... There's no point otherwise.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0013
rows.name:
It's fine. I have confidence
in this equipment.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0014
rows.name: Now, come at me.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0015
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] But it would be dangerous
to use my full power...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0016
rows.name: ...Here I go!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0017
rows.name:
Hahaha... It seems my
lightning-resistant equipment
still has a long way to go...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0018
rows.name: I'm so glad you're alive...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0019
rows.name:
Your power is incredible.
Don't let this get you down.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0020
rows.name:
Someday, I'll create equipment that
can withstand your lightning.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0021
rows.name:
When I do, please help
me test it again.

rows.label: qst502016_msg0022
rows.name: I will...!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0023
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ] But if I go all out next time, he
might have to start over again...

rows.label: qst502016_msg0024
rows.name: W-whoa...! No, I can't do it!

rows.label: qst502016_msg0025
rows.name:
I don't have the courage
to attack a person!
